Uses of Class
tiled.core.Tile

  • Packages that use Tile 
    Package Description
    tiled.core  

    • Uses of Tile in tiled.core

      Subclasses of Tile in tiled.core 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AnimatedTile
      Animated tiles take advantage of the Sprite class internally to handle animation using an array of tiles.
      Methods in tiled.core that return Tile 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Tile Sprite.getCurrentFrame() 
      Tile TileSet.getFirstTile()
      Returns the first non-null tile in the set.
      Tile Sprite.KeyFrame.getFrame(int f) 
      Tile TileSet.getTile(int i)
      Gets the tile with local id i.
      Tile TileLayer.getTileAt(int tx, int ty)
      Returns the tile at the specified position.
      Methods in tiled.core that return types with arguments of type Tile 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Iterator<Tile> TileSet.iterator()
      Returns an iterator over the tiles in this tileset.
      Methods in tiled.core with parameters of type Tile 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void TileSet.addNewTile(Tile t)
      This method takes a new Tile object as argument, and in addition to the functionality of addTile(), sets the id of the tile to -1.
      int TileSet.addTile(Tile t)
      Adds the tile to the set, setting the id of the tile only if the current value of id is -1.
      void Sprite.createKey(java.lang.String name, Tile[] frames, int flags) 
      boolean TileLayer.isUsed(Tile t)
      Checks to see if the given Tile is used anywhere in the layer.
      java.awt.Point TileLayer.locationOf(Tile t)
      Returns the first occurrence (using top down, left to right search) of the given tile.
      void TileLayer.removeTile(Tile tile)
      Removes any occurences of the given tile from this map layer.
      void TileLayer.replaceTile(Tile find, Tile replace)
      Replaces all occurrences of the Tile find with the Tile replace in the entire layer
      void Sprite.setFrames(Tile[] frames) 
      void TileLayer.setTileAt(int tx, int ty, Tile ti)
      Sets the tile at the specified position.
